text: A Troll in Central Park or Stanley's Magic Garden is an animated feature made in 1994. It is an Irish-American production. It is an animated fantasy comedy. It was directed by Don Bluth and Gary Goldman. It has a rating of 14% on Rotten Tomatoes. A Troll in Central Park (1994) is considered as one of the worst animated features of all time. A Troll in Central Park was released by Warner Bros. ==References== Category:1994 animated movies Category:1994 fantasy movies Category:1994 comedy movies Category:1990s fantasy-comedy movies Category:American animated movies Category:American fantasy-comedy movies Category:Movies set in Manhattan Category:1990s English-language movies Category:American musical comedy movies Category:Irish fantasy movies Category:Irish comedy movies Category:Movies directed by Don Bluth Category:Movies about witchcraft Category:Warner Bros. movies Category:Movies about children Category:Irish musical movies Category:1990s American musical movies Category:1994 adventure movies Category:American children's adventure movies Category:Irish adventure movies Category:Adventure comedy movies
title: A Troll in Central Park
